title: Went support/fill
body:
queue popped in 1 minute and i got top
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/173/576/Wat8.jpg?1315930535

replies.body: I done it once, and got mid. Someone dodged, got mid again.
https://media.giphy.com/media/9ak1b5vudNnEI/giphy.gif
http://40.media.tumblr.com/41b77c3bc13eecf3e64736f41ce47f5c/tumblr_njrzbh0wzz1r4n1r8o1_500.jpg?noredirect
The power of auto fill baby
You dumb? He picked fill as his secondary. Seriously, you anti-autofill people need to learn how shit works before you launch into your protests.
Jokes and sarcasm too complicated for you bruh?
LOL because the tone of sarcasm can totally be detected in 6 word phrase (not even a full sentence, btw). Perhaps learn what sarcasm ACTUALLY is before you make statements such as this.

*Goes to M&G*
*Still manages to flame someone*

This is a sentence.

That was 4 words.

That was also a sentence.

That was 5 words long.

This is Memes and Games.

You're taking the wrong thing seriously.

Well, I caught his sarcasm. Apparently so did the four other people who've commented on my post and your post in response to mine. So did multiple other people who commented on this thread. So from what I can see you are the only who didn't pick up on it. Furthermore, you are in the memes and games section, everything here is just for the fun of it. People don't come here to get serious. Only you do it would seem.

sar·casm
ˈsärˌkazəm/Submit
noun
the use of irony to mock or convey contempt.
"his voice, hardened by sarcasm, could not hide his resentment"

^ perhaps it is you who needs to learn what sarcasm means. Take note that it doesn't in any part of it say that how it is said plays into whether it is sarcasm or not, so there is literally no reason one cannot detect it in a 6 word TYPED phrase (a 6 word phrase as you chose to say it can easily be detected because from your limitations placed on it it can be spoken, you know since we're taking things literally right?). I will refer you back to my statement above though, and remind you that plenty of people understood what it is. Maybe you should check your context clues before you go talking shit to people. I've seen you in other threads too before I ever saw you on this one so I already know that you take things way way way too seriously. Also, to further prove that yes it can be detected, here is the definition of detected.

de·tect
dəˈtekt/
verb
past tense: detected; past participle: detected
discover or identify the presence or existence of.
"cancer may soon be detected in its earliest stages"
discover or investigate (a crime or its perpetrators).
"the public can help the police to detect crime"
synonyms:	discover, uncover, find out, turn up, unearth, dig up, root out, expose, reveal More
discern (something intangible or barely perceptible).
"Paul detected a faint note of weariness in his father's voice
your accumulation of downvotes is  probably a sign that your on the wrong board

My accumulation of downvotes means that I have stumbled into a wickedly entitled mosh pit of children that fail to grasp how this game used to be and that even with auto-fill, it is infinitely better.

you're misinterpreting what they're saying most of the time. i don't think many of the people you've responded to genuinely have much of a problem with autofill, if any. that's why you're getting downvotes. if you were responding to more people that obviously have a problem with it, i think you'd fare better, since i think the relative majority of players are okay with autofill, and really just getting tired of all the posts people are making about it being terrible.

tl;dr you're getting downvotes because you aren't making sense in context to the people you reply to, mostly.
http://i.imgur.com/Na1kz46.gif?noredirect
Humorless people gonna be humorless
Sarcasm is like near impossible to know via text
In Memes and Games, assume everything is sarcastic.

Went Support Fill and got Mid once
I was just like
"RITO I ACTUALLY WANTED TO PLAY SUPPORT WHY!"
I've gotten top multiple times as supp/fill or just fill along with mid, it's almost like people don't want to play top for some reason {{champion:126}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:85}}

When you see these threads side by side lol 
http://oi67.tinypic.com/dyqj47.jpg

Say hello to each other ;D

edit: sry for size. you'll have to open in new tab
Once in thousand years, a constellation is just right.
I only play support and that happened to me a lot :D check my history
i just had that last game ;p but then my sup picked urgot so karma neutral overall :p
